name: Spring Content Package
summary: Learn about .SD7 files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: NOTE: The Spring engine also uses .SDZ files, which store the package as a .ZIP file instead of a 7Z file.

description: Content package created for the Spring engine, a real-time strategy (RTS) game engine; contains game files stored together in a compressed .7Z format; can contain maps, graphics, AI scripts (.LUA files), and other game content.
